channel.title: How to add items to an interface
channel.description:
this is done in runescape. i havent seen this in any rs2 private server ive been in. does anyone know how to do this?
if you dont understand:
alright. some people dont understand. the attack menu has a list of items such as bronze, iron, black ect. and then it shows the level requirements and such. i was wantering if you can add that to the interface. or is that built into some interfaces. so i have to find it.
also i was wantering if you can make your own interfaces via .jpg files or somthing. make it read from file or somthing

item.title: How to add items to an interface
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

The items themselves but be different interfaces.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add items to an interface
